item.title: Texas governor threatens to remove Democrats who left state over Trump-backed redistricting
item.description: Texas Democrats have left the state in an attempt to prevent the state House from holding a vote Monday on new congressional maps that Republicans hope will net them several additional U.S.

item.title: Trump attacks Charlamagne Tha God after radio host criticizes his presidency
Former US soldier suspected of killing 4 in Montana remains at large
